votingsystems

Class IRVCandidate

  • java.lang.Object
    • votingsystems.Candidate
      • votingsystems.IRVCandidate

  • public class IRVCandidate
extends Candidate
    Represents a candidate in an instant runoff election.

    • Field Summary
